name: Suicide Slug DEMO
description:
Suicide Slug, a challenging platformer prototype demo.

This game was made in a weekend and shown at a local convention called the Vermont TechJam. It's a prototype/demo made in GameMaker Studio. Art made in MS Paint (I was going through a phase).

You are a slug. Traverse intense landscapes. Maneuver challenging obstacles. Avoid spikes and other hazards. You are a slug so daring, it's almost suicidal.

"That's cool"- friends

"10/10 best work bro"- Me

"ERROR"- GameMaker

Please give it a play, and if you think I should continue work on it or not, please tell me, any suggestions or ideas are greatly welcome.

Game by InstantLife

Music by nanocyte (http://nanocyte.newgrounds.com/)
